title: Homelab notes: logs, backups, and the art of not losing your mind
author: Jason Lamb
content_html:
Your homelab will eventually betray you. The only question is whether you left yourself a note.

Three rules

  1. Logs or it didn’t happen. Centralize where possible.
  2. Backups or it didn’t matter. 3-2-1 beats hope.
  3. Documentation or it didn’t belong in prod. Yes, your lab has prod now.

Make future-you smug instead of furious.
